text.en:
2 monsters, including a Ritual Monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field and 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; shuffle both cards into the Deck. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Dyna Mond" once per turn.
